FeedbackText.description: A list of feedback points provided by the user about the product, service and business model if relevant..

items.description: A feedback point from the user.

FeedbackRating.description: A rating given by the user on a scale from one to ten including a short sentence summarizing their opinion around 50 words long.

FeedbackRecommendation.description: A list of recommended actions or suggestions provided by the user.

items.description: A detailed recommended action or suggestion for improving or furthering the product.
